definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: I lifted my right hand and made scissoring movements with my first two fingers.
sentences.chinese: 我抬起右手，用食指和中指做了几个剪东西的动作。

sentences.english: Look for scratching or fiddling with clothing.
sentences.chinese: 关注抓挠或拨弄衣服的动作。
风筝要以机头向上的姿态结束动作。

sentences.english: It introduces the motion requirement and the structural characters of yawing and variable pitch.
sentences.chinese: 简述了偏航和变桨距系统结构特点和动作要求。

sentences.english: Hope that the United States will abandon the Cold War mentality, not in Hongkong to engage in political gamesmanship.
sentences.chinese: 希望美方摒弃冷战思维，不在香港搞政治上的小动作。

sentences.english: Positions continued price stability decreasing, and every higher up the action alone.
sentences.chinese: 价稳持仓量续递减，多单有逢高回吐动作。

sentences.english: The value passed to the actions should be comma-delimited lists of values.
sentences.chinese: 传递给动作的值应该是以逗号分隔的值列表。

sentences.english: She resembles her mother in the way she moves her hands when she talks.
sentences.chinese: 她说话时打手势的动作像她妈妈。

sentences.english: These patients are told to blink their eyes and to respire through their noses.
sentences.chinese: 八位患者并告之以眨眼动作，并由鼻孔呼吸。

sentences.english: With the formal suits but humorous gestures, the Chorale made their first appearance.
sentences.chinese: 正式的着装，诙谐的动作，是该合唱团的出场秀。

sentences.english: The motion has a distinct realistic quality, as the objects first accelerate and then decelerate.
sentences.chinese: 动作显得很逼真，选择的控件先是加速，再略略减慢。

sentences.english: In Taipei's movie district, the action flicks are always the biggest draws.
sentences.chinese: 台北西门町的电影街中，动作片的观众总是最多。

sentences.english: The movements feel so weird and unnatural. Is this normal?
sentences.chinese: 动作感觉很别扭不自然，这正常吗？

sentences.english: They all age a hundred without decline in motion because of their perfect upright virtue.
sentences.chinese: 所以能年皆度百岁而动作不衰者，以其德全不危也。

sentences.english: This is full stroke swimming with a front-mount snorkel.
sentences.chinese: 这是戴呼吸管的完整划臂动作。

sentences.english: She loves singing, dancing, drawing and all other interesting things.
sentences.chinese: 整个人物的动作也很有趣，像是扭秧歌。

definition: to sway one's hips/to twist one's waist
to kick one's legs/leg press (exercise)/(coll.) to kick the bucket
the splits (move in dancing)/to do the splits/Taiwan pr. [pi3 cha1]
